fields.name: Student's Legal First Name (as stated on their birth certificate)

options.formula:
SWITCH(
  {fld0wYBgoCfkZcuKJ},
  "Colorado Homeschool Enrichment", "02 - Continuous in same school with no interruption of schooling",
  "A Colorado public school", "13 - Transfer from a public school in a different Colorado LEA.",
  "A school located in a different country", "05 - Transfer from a school located in a different country",
  "A school located in a different state", "14 - Transfer from a school located in a different state or US Territory.",
  "Home-based education (homeschooling)", "16 - Transfer from home-based education (home schooling)",
  "New to educational system (Kindergarten students only)", "01 - New to educational system",
  "Private school", "15 - Transfer from a non-public school",
  "A Detention Center", "12 - Transfer from a detention center within LEA",
  "Returning to education after an extended absence", "16 - Transfer from home-based education (home schooling)",
  "Re-entry after dropping out (10th-12th graders only)", "40 - Re-entry after dropping out from same LEA in a previous school year.",
  "Graduated", "90 - Graduated with regular diploma",
  "00 - No/Not Applicable (grades 7-12)"
)

fields.name: Status of Synergy (from Student Truth) copy

choices.name: Needs to be added to Synergy
Needs to be Removed from Synergy

options.formula:
IF(
  OR(
    DATETIME_DIFF(DATETIME_PARSE("2025-10-01", "YYYY-MM-DD"), {fldya31Cb8IADmmkp}, "years") < 5,
    DATETIME_DIFF(DATETIME_PARSE("2025-10-01", "YYYY-MM-DD"), {fldya31Cb8IADmmkp}, "years") > 20
  ),
  "Student is " & DATETIME_DIFF(DATETIME_PARSE("2025-10-01", "YYYY-MM-DD"), {fldya31Cb8IADmmkp}, "years") & 
  " years old (" & 
  IF(
    DATETIME_DIFF(DATETIME_PARSE("2025-10-01", "YYYY-MM-DD"), {fldya31Cb8IADmmkp}, "years") < 5,
    "too young",
    "too old"
  ) & ")",
  ""
)
